©2022 Merit MedicalINCREASING OUR USAGE OF GREEN ENERGY
Supporting and utilizing renewable “green” energy is pivotal to our long-term 
climate change strategy at Merit. During 2021, we increased our overall usage 
of renewable energy by 15%. We do this through a variety of methods, including 
hydroelectric power, purchasing units of energy generated through wind and solar 
from local utility providers, and new for 2022, the installation of solar panels on 
selected Merit properties. Part of our continuous improvement goals is creating 
long-term site plans for each of our locations that include an assessment on 
increasing green energy usage year over year.
2030 ENERGY GOAL
By 2030, 50% of Merit’s 
energy usage will come from 
renewable sources, and our 
energy intensity will decrease 
by 10%, indexed to revenue.
